# Welcome Signs

If the server you're playing is welcome signs-based, you must place a sign to allow players to visit your region!

## Setting Up Welcome Signs

You are only allowed to place one single sign per region, but you can place more signs if you have multiple regions.

### Step 1: Place a Sign

Place any type of sign (oak, spruce, birch, etc.) inside your region.

### Step 2: Format the Sign

Write the sign text in this exact format:

```
Line 1: [Welcome]
Line 2: (Region name)
Line 3: (Leave empty)
Line 4: (Leave empty)
```

**Example:**

<img src="data:image/png;base64,">

## How Welcome Signs work

Welcome signs allows players to visit regions based on your name! You can set up multiple signs in different regions you own.

**Usage:**

```
/region visit [player] (index-of-welcome-sign)
```

**Example:**
```
/region visit Steve
/region visit Alex 4
```

!!! info

    Welcome signs index may be different if you place more signs in different regions,
    use random indexes to determine which sign index will teleport you to the right region!
